jdbc-user-service.users-by-username-query: SELECT ( SELECT v.attribute_value FROM value v INNER JOIN attribute attr ON v.attribute_id = attr.attribute_id WHERE attr.attribute_name = 'username' AND v.entity_id = aaa.entity_id) AS 'username', (SELECT v.attribute_value FROM value v INNER JOIN attribute attr ON v.attribute_id = attr.attribute_id WHERE attr.attribute_name = 'password' AND v.entity_id = aaa.entity_id) AS 'password', (SELECT if((SELECT v.attribute_value FROM value v INNER JOIN attribute attr ON v.attribute_id = attr.attribute_id WHERE attr.attribute_name = 'enabled' AND v.entity_id = aaa.entity_id)='1', TRUE,FALSE)) AS 'enabled' FROM (SELECT v.entity_id FROM value v INNER JOIN attribute attr ON v.attribute_id = attr.attribute_id WHERE attr.attribute_name = 'username' AND v.attribute_value=?) aaa;
